QuestData.Title: Vision of the Dead
QuestData.Description: It has already begun. Levixus stands atop the ruins of Auchindoun and reads from the book of the dead. He calls the dead out by name and, through demonic ritual, binds the tortured souls to his will. He will raise all of Auchindoun if given the chance!$B$BBut... you must first prepare. You cannot do battle with that which you cannot see.$B$B<Nitrin hands you a parchment.>$B$BBring me the items I require to brew the tincture. It will open your mind and allow you to see into the spirit world.
QuestData.LogDescription: Nitrin at the Abandoned Armory in Nagrand wants you to bring him 1 Mountain Gronn Eyeball, 1 Flawless Greater Windroc Beak, and 1 Aged Clefthoof Blubber.
QuestData.CompletionText: Levixus's army grows in size and power with each second that passes. You must hurry.
QuestData.RewardText: Stranger... I was not forthright with you. Once you drink this potion, you will forever see into the world of the dead. This recipe that you drink of is a rite of initiation for all death priests of Auchindoun. Many go mad after its effects have taken hold. Seeing the dead is ... shocking.$B$B<Nitrin puts the potion up to your lips.>$B$BDo you wish to continue?
